snippet: The Montgomery County coroner said Wednesday that a man who killed his ex-wife and five of her relatives did not stab himself, as was initially reported.
abstract: Montgomery County, Pa, coroner Walter Hofman says Bradley Stone, who killed his ex-wife and five of her relatives, did not stab himself, as was initially reported; authorities are awaiting toxicology reports on Stone.
lead_paragraph: The Montgomery County coroner said Wednesday that a man who killed his ex-wife and five of her relatives did not stab himself, as was initially reported.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Cause of Death of Man in Rampage Not Known
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Cause of Death of Man in Rampage Not Known
